name: Present Master (Fabula Officina)
description:
Santa's Running Late!

It's almost that time of the year's evening when Santa needs to start making hundreds of trips around the world to start delivering gifts to good kids. It's just that he's running a little late due to other business duties that keep things in the workshop running smoothly. Help Santa package gifts and load them up on his sleigh for his first trip for the night.

---

Present Master is a simple strategy/management game for Windows computers. A mouse is required to play the game.

This was made for Secret Santa Jam 2022, for Discord user/giftee C1PO.

---

Your support is valued

If you find the kinds of games and tool that I make valuable, please consider donating to Fabula Officina. Your contribution helps me continue developing software that you and everyone can enjoy.
